Description: Pigment, squarish lump or cake of deep Egyptian blue, prepared for the painter, much granulated.
Curator's comments: Published in: Regulski, I. (ed.), 2022. Hieroglyphs: unlocking ancient Egypt, pp. 225-6
Exhibition history: 2022-2023 13 Oct-19 Feb, London, BM, Hieroglyphs: unlocking ancient Egypt
